scripts.poa_info: az group deployment show -g alispoa -n alispoadeploy | jq '.properties.outputs'
scripts.rpc: az group deployment show -g alispoa -n alispoadeploy | jq -r '.properties.outputs.ethereum_rpc_endpoint.value'
scripts.admin: az group deployment show -g alispoa -n alispoadeploy | jq '.properties.outputs.admin_site.value' | xargs open
scripts.oms: az group deployment show -g alispoa -n alispoadeploy | jq '.properties.outputs.oms_portal_url.value' | xargs open
scripts.ssh: az group deployment show -g alispoa -n alispoadeploy | jq -r '.properties.outputs.ssh_to_first_vl_node_region1.value'
